attributes.action: access to free sanitary products in secondary school toilets
attributes.additional_details: we want this because some people may feel uncomfortable asking and they may not have period products available to them
attributes.background:
we want sanitary products available in our school toilets. this is because some people may go to unsafe measures in order to control their menstrual cycle due to a lack of product availability
we did a petition within our community and 76.2% of people with periods said they would benefit from this

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

Decisions about access to free sanitary products in school toilets are a matter for individual schools, not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund free feminine hygiene products:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597571
